_comments.currency_symbol: The currency symbol to be displayed for prices.

display._comment: Controls what elements are shown on the product card.
display.show_rating_on_card: If true, shows the star rating on the main product card.
display.show_review_count_on_card: If true, shows the number of reviews next to the star rating.
display.show_description_on_card: If true, displays the product's short description on the card.
display.show_reviews_on_card: If true, displays a list of recent customer reviews on the card.

badge._comment: Configuration for badges displayed on the product image.
badge.discount_variant: The visual style of the discount badge. Corresponds to badge variants in 'src/components/ui/badge.tsx'. Options: 'default', 'secondary', 'destructive', 'outline'.
badge.promo_type_classes: Direct Tailwind CSS classes for styling the 'promo_type' badge.
